name: Dogbowling
description:
Bowl your spherical dog friend towards the monsters to escape the dungeon that looks suspiciously like a bowling alley!

Features:
- Press space to roll the dog!
- A or D to curve the dog!
- 2 minutes long!
- Don't get hit by fireballs!
- Don't ask why the bats shoot fireballs!

This is a short game I made to learn how to make games, so give it a try and see if it's a fun minute or two.
